display_long_description:
The classic VR escape game is back by popular demand, with new graphics and features for Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3!

Floor Plan Remastered is a short-form puzzle adventure that takes place entirely inside an elevator. Go floor to floor, find items, and meet a bizarre cast of characters. Discover relationships between different things in the building and unlock its secrets... all from the comfort of your elevator.

[media]

# FEATURES
- Classic, hand-crafted point-and-click style adventure game goodness
- Packed with charming characters and puzzles
- Designed to be comfortable for everyone
- Simple controls that support standing or seated play
- Unlockable, never-before-released prototype elevator that shows the early beginnings of Floor Plan

[media]

# SHORT BUT SWEET
Floor Plan takes most players about one hour to complete. It is priced accordingly, and we think it has enough special moments to be memorable and something you'll want to share with friends and family. Thanks for checking it out!

Want more? Check out Floor Plan 2 - a much larger sequel with 6+ hours of puzzles - also available now on Meta Quest.
